info.name: Rotating Squares
info.description: Some squares rotate. Inspired by https://www.dwitter.net/d/10953

renderpass.code:
#define mainImage(c,f)                           \
    float i, t = modf(mod(iTime*.5,2.), i);      \
    vec2 v = abs( vec2(mod(f+i*40.,80.)-40.)     \
                   * mat2(cos( 1.57*t*t*(3.-2.*t) + vec4(0,11,33,0))) ); \
    c += (i-.5)*(v.x+v.y-40.)
renderpass.name: Image
